website_summaries.verdict: A salt therapy inhaler consisting of Himalayan salt with 84 trace minerals.
pros: Great for reducing mucus and congestion
Consists of salt pipe and neti pot
cons: Salt will last up to two years with regular use and then need to be replaced

customer_reviews.title: So good this is my second!
customer_reviews.text: Last fall after a nasty bout of bronchitis I had a lingering cough and congestion in my lungs that would not go away. After using this diligently 2x a day, I noticed a massive improvement in a few days and after a bit over a week it was gone completely! I also love that the inhaler is ceramic and that they use a BPA-free rubber stopper showing their focus on quality. I know ceramic is a bit more fragile, but it looks nicer and I feel better not inhaling from a plastic inhaler.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle L Heyman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased inhalers from this company in the past with really good experiences. I have some severe chronic conditions that the inhalers have helped. With this latest purchase, however, my experience was very different. As soon as I took the first inhale I tasted and smelled horrible chemicals! It was upsetting. I was worried about what I may have inhaled and exposed myself to. And, there are NO returns, not even for defective items. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Felt nothing
customer_reviews.text: It just arrive today. The lid to the box had scotch tape on it that was broken...the bottom of the pipe has cracks.. I tried huffin and puffin in though the mouth out the nose and felt nuffin☹️..tried 5 minutes with many more puffs; still nuffin ...I think I tasted salt a teeny bit 🤔.. So far very disappointed but will try a few more days and write another review.. I should have gone to the beach... one star because its pretty... then I'll review again.. sorry folks.... why I cant post more than 1 photo???
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using on a regular basis, I couldn't tell any difference. Had to use my prescription inhaler.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I use this while I am watching TV. It is relaxing and it works well. I strongly believe in Halotherapy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: No benefit whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Bought product with moderately high hopes, used it frequently for weeks, zero benefit. Fraudulent product for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn H. Garber

customer_reviews.title: An answer to years of discomfort and not breathing.
customer_reviews.text: I have serious sinus issues surgery twice and this product has given me comfort without the use of more pills and sprays. I am praying it continues to give me the same results because it’s so refreshing gives me the ability to breathe and release mucus.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me. Doesn't seem to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Doesn't seem to work as stated for asthma and allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I think it helps with sinus problems. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it helps with sinus problems. I use it while watching tv. It's a little weird, but it is soothing when you have a lot of sinus issues.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Seibert

customer_reviews.title: but I like it. Less expensive models are available
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it helped, but I like it. Less expensive models are available.
customer_reviews.author: Horse lover

customer_reviews.title: Misinformation
customer_reviews.text: In the item description it says the piece is made in USA. On the box that contains the inhaler, it says it’s made in Pakistan. Please clarify.
customer_reviews.author: mary alice hoeschele

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the base was chipped and the rubber part was torn! Packaged poorly!!! Very disappointed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective . . .
customer_reviews.text: My wife suffers from asthma and she's using a couple prescription medications. Preferring to try more holistic methods of relieving symptoms we ordered this salt inhaler. My wife experienced a noticeable improvement in her breathing when using this, presumably because the salts draw out excess moisture that causes breathing difficulty. While we're not medical experts, we can say that she's had positive results using this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Tlingel59

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler because of the proven results on inhaling ocean air. I have observed and heard others say the same; that inhaling the ocean air can be experienced. I for one notice a "cleaning effect" of the lungs. After leaving the ocean I feel my lungs can hold more oxygen. Thus giving me more energy and a better overall feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald K. Yancey

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice item, never heard of it until it was shown on a popular tv show. Does help my husbands breathing problem and love it cause it is natural.
customer_reviews.author: keynotes

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I now have two
customer_reviews.text: The inhaler has helped me a lot, I love it. I now have two, one at work an one at home. Buy one everybody!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: This has helped more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I have had asthma for years and years and recently I noticed it seemed to be worsening. I saw this advertised and thought I'd try it. I was pleasantly surprised with the results. It seems to open my airways. I will continue using it and would recommend it to anyone with difficulty with asthma.
customer_reviews.author: goldens

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My allergies & asthma have not been as bad as it has in the past. This really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M House

customer_reviews.title: It never did anything for me.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned mine for several months. It does nothing to remedy my wheezing. So I finally discarded it. Real salt therapy might work by sitting in a salt room or a salt cave. But this is a poor substitute for the real thing. It is just a novelty item.
customer_reviews.author: Apoiuwerhpga

customer_reviews.title: This breather is wonderful and I now have 4 Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhalers.
customer_reviews.text: Oh do I use these Original Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhalers. I use them all all day long in all of the rooms in work in and my truck as well. The Himalayan Salt Inhaler is helpful to clean and clear my mouth and nose. A good item to use all day and every day to help keep you self-healing your self.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: hepled my asthma
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the salt inhaler for a month now. It has really controlled my asthma to the point of not needing my prescription inhalers as long as i use the salt inhaler daily.
customer_reviews.author: AntjeR

customer_reviews.title: very glad for the product
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 4 stars instead of five because I have not used it long enough. I purchased it for allergies and sinus problems. It seems to help and will continue to use it. Hopefully when the pollens are active again in the spring I will be able to tell more....very glad for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Belee

customer_reviews.title: Chest cold relief
customer_reviews.text: Yikes, this has gotten more expensive! Glad I got mine when I did, especially this morning. Sipped my way through a six pack of ginger ale over night and awoke this morning to painful wracking coughs. I wondered whether my bottle of cough syrup was as old as my last chest cold 4 years ago. I spied this inhaler on my night stand. I'd used with middling results for occasional sinusitis. I was surprised that within a few deep, slow draws, my sore throat and stinging lungs were soothed and quieted. I still have a voice two octaves below normal, but I was able to start a normal morning routine that otherwise would have been much more uncomfortable! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Cinemind

customer_reviews.title: Helped a lot
customer_reviews.text: Still searching for a replacement for Primatene Mist. This doesn't replace, but does a good job of clearing the pipes. I found that using it a few times during the day is better than before bed. It was easier to clear my throat earlier and made sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Burke

customer_reviews.title: My chest felt better with the first inhale
customer_reviews.text: My chest felt better with the first inhale, but my throat got progressively raw and my voice was non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with my asthma. I used it faithfully for three months and noticed no difference. I feel like it was a complete waste of money and time
customer_reviews.author: Dazeek

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. I have COPD, and this device has no effect. I find that any product containing Guaifenesin does the job though.
customer_reviews.author: John Irby

customer_reviews.title: didn't help me
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this. It seemed to be putting too much salt in my body. I would cough and could taste salt.
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Breathe right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who was allergies. It's great because as you use it, about 10-15 mins. it helps with clearing your lungs but also gives you a great feeling of having meditated. Becoming more aware of your breathing and in tune to your body.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Product is somewhat beneficial
customer_reviews.text: People with breathing problems are helped. You have to breathe deeply to get substantial air into your air passages. Between the abreathing and the fine salt you are inhaling the back of your throat gets dry. I imagine the same is happening to your airways leading to tour lungs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use when ever you want without having to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Muriel Grant

customer_reviews.title: Better Sleep
customer_reviews.text: My wife talked me in to buying it.The product has help me with me coughing and snoring. It opens my lungs and breathing.I'm glad I listen to her this time.
customer_reviews.author: Wayneo

customer_reviews.title: We liked it so much that we bought one for myself
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th one. We liked it so much that we bought one for myself, my husband, mother in law, and friend. Easy to use and works real well to clear the sinuses in just a few inhales.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette McSparrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, it seems to help my son a lot!
customer_reviews.author: KQ

customer_reviews.title: I use saline netti pots and nasal spray
customer_reviews.text: I think the inhaler is better for me than the prescribed ones, not sure but am trying it. Also have a salt lamp in bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I need it to help my breathing.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is cracked. Fine cracked lines. It was this way when I took it out of the box. I made a picture of it. Just received it today at 1:00 pm. February 6, 2018.
customer_reviews.author: nelva dyle

customer_reviews.title: I wish there would have been a CLEAR statement that ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish there would have been a CLEAR statement that this product does NOT include the SALT. Was this a NEW product?, because the product box seal was broken...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Original Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: This inhaler did not completely help my asthma and bronchial problems but defiantly helps and I use it every day, sometimes for and hour or more!
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Chatterson

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not as good as the Squib
customer_reviews.text: I've used salt inhalers for the past 6 months to help keep my chest clear. I suffer from severe allergies, that then trigger asthma. I am almost always ill after staying in a hotel room from the weird air and pollutants in those enclosed spaces. These inhalers keep me from getting ill and keep the mucous at bay. This one is fine, but not nearly as good as the Squib inhaler.
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: wonderful experience
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product on the Dr. Oz show. I ordered it on line and I love it. I recommend it to anyone. The salt crystal lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paula L

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day.
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the Himalayan Salt Inhaler on the Dr. Oz show I thought it looked like a good idea. It is a good easy to use health aide and I use the Inhaler every day.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Pencil

customer_reviews.title: Original Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhalersinue
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with product and I received it from Amazon in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette A. Steward

customer_reviews.title: himalyan crystal salt inhaler
customer_reviews.text: What a amazing difference this has made with my asthma, allergies, sinus, and breathing. Dr Oz needs to be thanked as that is where I heard of it. I have tried everything and nothing has ever helped so much. I normally end up on predisone (a steriod)during ragweed season, and I am almost never able to breath though my nose most of the season. I am now able to breath through my nose and that also helps the asthma. This works and is so easy to use. I use it driving to and from work. I use daily 20-40 minutes daily. Great price and fast, great service from amazon. I tell everyone how great this product is.
customer_reviews.author: miss dolly

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: I have COPD and Asthma. I purchased this product a while ago and I thought it helped with my breathing... I am on a low salt diet and didn't realize that I was retaining water because of the sodium in the inhaler and had to be taken to the ER for Congestive heart failure...I didn't even put that in my thoughts when I tried the Himalayan Salt Inhaler... Just wanted to mention this in case there are others with the same problem...other than that I thought it was helping me....
customer_reviews.author: ginge

customer_reviews.title: After five days of use very little sign of any improvement...
customer_reviews.text: In my or my wife's condition related to bronchitis. Perhaps it works for allergy situations, but I would not recommend if you are looking for relief from cold symptoms. Granted the cold I have is particularly nasty with regard to coughing, even so..had I seen a couple more reviews like mine I feel like I would have though twice before pursing this solution.
customer_reviews.author: Faja4x

customer_reviews.title: Hard to breathe through
customer_reviews.text: I should have anticipated that it would be hard to breathe through. My mouth and cheek muscles cramp after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndal Hart

customer_reviews.title: reviewing inhaler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the inhaler on the advise of my homopathic Dr. I saw the reviews before were mostly for asthmatics, but I thought I would try it for COPD. I haven't experienced any great results with it, but have only been using for a few weeks. The one thing I know for sure is that it totally drys your mouth out.
customer_reviews.author: Red Skeleton

customer_reviews.title: Salt inhaler
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if I am experiencing any results. My daughter bought the same item online for half the price
customer_reviews.author: hwnpunch

customer_reviews.title: It's proably just the effort to take deep breaths that we need to do which is non related to the salt crystals.
customer_reviews.text: I watched Dr. Oz and took their recommendation to try the salt inhaler. Of course; how could it hurt right? Well, I think the effort of inhaling deeply is the reason this treatment works vs the actual salt dust entering the nasal passages. Deep breathing expands the lungs and creates a greater space for an oxygen exchange over the alveoli in the base of the lungs. If you are oxygen dependent I would encourage you to try this treatment as it would enhance the oxygen exchange therefore allowing you to breath with greater ease.
customer_reviews.author: toots

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, but can't ya that I felt any different using it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Concerned
customer_reviews.text: I am concerned about inhaling before cleaning first. The salt does not appear to be in a separate container. If I remember right, the whole device was packaged in plastic.
customer_reviews.author: linda stevens

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Still testing and can't really give you an honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: time

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: it leaves a SALT taste in your mouth and works a little bit for asthma.Wouldn't recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work okay, but I haven't been very diligent in using it. I should get back to using it on a regular basis.

customer_reviews.title: Broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and it was broken. How do I return it?
customer_reviews.author: bono

customer_reviews.title: BUMMER!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work...does nothing at all. I called the company and they said it is not for bronchial/ nasal problems, only MIGHT help with deep breathing diseases like emphysema,etc. On the Dr. Oz Show it was presented as a way to clear bronchial/ nasal passages...not so according to the company and the fact of no results/improvement at all. Waste of money...and I also bought an extra package of salt. Boo on Dr. Oz.!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bascum A..Walker

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get used much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, but he doesn't use it much. I bought the salt refill pack to go with it but, since it's been a while since I've given him the gift and the refill pack hasn't been opened yet, I would say that it's not all it's cracked up to be.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Responsible health benefits are premature!
customer_reviews.text: The result from the use of the product is currently premature. I do not expect a result or desired outcome for at least 30 to 45 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Salt Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: This whole salt routine with inhaler is a joke. It does not work! Do not buy it! Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Mystery

customer_reviews.title: Purchases
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the children's book of saints for my CCD Class for their First Communion gift . Their day is Saturday. i thought the book was just what I was looking for. I thoroughly enjoyed Christine Falls and A Week In Winter, Maeve Binchy's last novel,( one of my favorite authors). Used the Himalayan Salt inhaler and found help. It came highly recommended by friends. Have not yet finished the Orphan Master's Son. Marilyn
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Christian

customer_reviews.title: salt  inhaler
customer_reviews.text: who the hell has time to due this for 10 mins a day like it says to. its in the trash. maybe help someone with more sinus problems. not a fan
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Salt Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit skeptical on the benefits of this salt inhaler; however, it's worth a try. The reason why is that I've read that it benefitted those who were physically in big caves containing this salt, so I'm unsure how this little device will benefit. Therefore, I can't say yet if it has any benefit at this time which is why my rating. However, I did receive the item very quickly and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter, she's a part time employee with no insurance. I purchased this product after learning she had a severe asthma attack at work. We are in two different states, I rushed order this product , hoping it would speed up her recovery. She informed me that upon receiving the product she was on her third day of mild wheezing. After just one use she immediately began to feel better, she is confident she can depend on this product to help her recover quickly, should she ever feel an asthma attack and start wheezing. This product might not be right for everyone, but its a great choice for her needs.
customer_reviews.author: Denah

customer_reviews.title: I spent a lot of my childhood on the ocean and this brings back that tranquil feeling plus helps you breathe better.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I spent a lot of my childhood on the ocean and this brings back that tranquil feeling plus helps you breathe better.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Helps my breathing
customer_reviews.text: I believe this has helped my lungs quite a bit. I have asthma-like symptoms sometimes, some kind of inflammation, and taking the time to do some deep breathing using this inhaler really helps.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceBeWithYou

customer_reviews.title: Risky business
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel much of a change in health and I live in Colorado. I'm dissapointed in this product and I was hoping for a change in my health. As I suffer from bad asthma. Choose at your on risk.
customer_reviews.author: LeRay

customer_reviews.title: Congestion Relieved
customer_reviews.text: Had sinus infection for two weeks before receiving product. After third day of use, marked breathing improvement.

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad...
customer_reviews.text: That I finally purchased this! Using this has enabled me to decrease the use of asthma inhalers! The medical field should be prescribing this for all those who suffer from asthma, bronchitis and copd!

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but can't verify any health claims
customer_reviews.text: Always looking for natural allergy treatment. Tried this for several weeks straight but didn't feel any real changes in symptoms. But didn't hurt me either. Good packaging and timely shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Salt is so healing
customer_reviews.text: I works really good for my asthma . And I use a prescription inhaler just a little.

customer_reviews.text: this is very good to help breathing as allergies can cause problems the relieve really help between treatments to easing to breath

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and does a great job. I have suffered with allergies and asthma for years and this is a far better option than prescription sprays.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Great Holistic Solution for Breathing Problems
customer_reviews.text: I got this after having two surgeries in three weeks and developing reactive airway disease. After being on oral steroids, I wanted something more natural instead of having to rely on inhalers or more oral steroids. I use this between 15 minutes and 2 hours a day and it has made all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Cure for allergies
customer_reviews.text: With frequent use (20-30 mins a day) my seasonal allergies have been cured and no more need for pricey medication
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I have acute asthma and this inhaler has been helping me very much.
customer_reviews.author: Mv77

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised it works
customer_reviews.text: After hearing Dr. Oz talk about the himalayan salt inhaler I decided it couldn't hurt to try it. After heart surgery my lungs were left weakened and I wheeze without being able to breath deeply. Been using the inhaler since Nov. it is now Jan and I am wheezing much less and can breath easier. It isn't a cure-all but anything that encourages deeper breathing is a help. It is good to have salt rather than chemicals to breath into your lungs. I have a neice who has ashma that I purchased another one for.
customer_reviews.author: fix it man

customer_reviews.title: you need to be persistant s
customer_reviews.text: thankyou for hope lord of getting off my terrible second enhaler I started using with the calif fires have not had this kind of asthma since I was a teen and now senior the white one is prob just as good but decided to get another one of these because not sure about the smell if it is supposed to smell and these are a blerssing sometimes when you are in the middle of something like asthma you may be a little not thinking straight slowed down
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe, clarifying inhaler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and excellent for sore throat or sinus issues. Very clarifying and clears mucous lining. The salts last a LONG time & refills are easy to find and purchase. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Debb DB

customer_reviews.title: Provides great sinus relief
customer_reviews.text: This product along with the neti pothas provided me relief from all my sinus and allergy problems. Used to have to take both Flonase and Zyrtec daily to stay on top of my sinus and allergy problems. This product has enabled me to stop taking the Flonase completely and now I only have to take Zyrtec a couple of times a month. Have recommended this product to several of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe Trice

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that something so simple could be effective. After suffering with an allergy-related cough for months, I decided to give it a chance. After only a few days of using the inhaler, my cough has disappeared. Whether it is all in my head, coincidence, or the salt inhaler, I guess I don't know. I do know that for the first time in six months I am cough-free. I whole hearted recommend you try it if you are having upper respiratory issues. The seller was also great! Quick shipping, etc. I am a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every morning and every night. It has stopped a pain I was feeling in my chest for years.
customer_reviews.author: Make-A-Holic

customer_reviews.title: Does it make a difference?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to cut down the phlegm I have in my lungs. I used it every day for 15 minutes for a month and quite frankly could not tell any difference. I have stopped using it now for 2 weeks and again, no discernible difference. I would not recommend trying it. However, on the positive side, the supplier I bought it from was excellent and the product is built well of heavy materials. It is NOT a piece of cheap plastic. If you decide to try it anyway, I hope it works better for you than it did for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Hans

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I have been getting slightly asthmatic from raking leaves.. i use this for 10 minutes and my lungs are clear.
customer_reviews.author: Granite

customer_reviews.title: Does improve breathing
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not this product does improve your breathing. I suggest to anyone willing to try it, and you gotta believe it works.
customer_reviews.author: AppleCiderVinegar

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed by this Himalayan Sea Salt inhaler. The company who makes it is very ingenious. I have asthma and COPD and it helps me so I DO NOT have to breathe in any steroidal Inhalers. I have been free from chemicals for over 3 years now and I love it. I have recommended to others for their respiratory issues. It does what it says. I would order again. I ordered 4 of them and all of my family and friends that are using them feel the same way I do. It really works. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen  Toepfer

customer_reviews.title: himalayan crystal salt inhaler
customer_reviews.text: inhaler was well made. one of the best purchases i have made. this inhaler is amazing. use it everyday and feel great. everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: nancy vandegrift

customer_reviews.title: sinus helper
customer_reviews.text: The Himalayan inhaler is great. Seems to help my sinus problems and has stopped me from coughing. Easy to use. I just don't use it for 20 minutes at a time but try to use it several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: patriot

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's supposed to help with breathing but I didn't notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Immense help with Asthma! Easy to use too!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son's girlfriend and it arrived about two weeks ago. Prior to ordering, she was using a conventional inhaler multiple times a day. She swears by the salt inhaler and hasn't had to use her regular asthma inhaler since it arrived. The instructions are clear and easy to follow. She did have to use it for ten minutes the very first day, but since then, has cut back to two minutes a day. This inhaler really works for her!
customer_reviews.author: Avocado Fantom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product used it a lot in the right seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler really works
customer_reviews.text: I found that this product really works well in making breathing much easier when I'm suffering from allergy and/or asthma symptoms. The order process was great, and I received the package very quickly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Price

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it and wish it was more effective; but, not a mistake to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Natural Health
customer_reviews.text: I too saw this product on the Dr. Oz show and thought it was worth trying. It works well in clearing bronchial congestion. Great natural remedy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Judy

customer_reviews.title: it seems to work
customer_reviews.text: i have used this item for about a month and i seem to feel better and am breathing deeper. my only problem with it is i have no idea when i should refill the salt
customer_reviews.author: stardustsara

customer_reviews.title: Detox for your lungs
customer_reviews.text: I have a lung condition and figured anything to prolong my health I will try.
customer_reviews.author: Licensed esthetician

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and the ceramic has an odor.
customer_reviews.text: Not money well spent. The salt is a home run, but anyone who needs an inhaler like this will probably not do well inhaling some odor I was picking up, from the ceramic maybe. Sort of defeats the purpose of the inhaler.
customer_reviews.author: Barbarahh

customer_reviews.title: If you have high blood pressue, beware
customer_reviews.text: I've had ringing in the ears and was hoping this would help.... It really didn't. But, worse, the salt puts a lot of salt into your system.... I can even taste it. I am concerned about my high blood pressure. It has been totally under control and now it is spiking.... Not worth taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Balsiger

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help prevent sickness!
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money on this. I bought it in hopes that I would notice a change in my asthma and also to help prevent me from getting sick so often. It did neither. It has been sitting in my cabinet collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: GnosticReviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is a knock-off product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product twice and it was sold by North Georgia Mercantile and when I received the product it was not the Original Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler from Natural Health International which is pictured in this ad. I notified Amazon both times and returned the product to them. Amazon was going to investigate and get back to me. They never did. For a short time they pulled the product, but now I see it is back on the website. If you order from North Georgia Mercantile make sure you get the product you pay for and which should be exactly as the picture in the ad. Both of mine were not and they have been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rating for the product alone
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry I bought it. First the ceramic container is not sealed. I wiped it off but I was hesitant to put that in my mouth. Amazon was sold out so I bought it with a seller through Amazon but he was higher priced than Amazon so technically I paid for shipping. I bought this for better immunity or shorter colds but all it is doing is drying and irritatng my throat. My doctor told me to stop using it when I told her about it. Was it a good investment ? NO!!! Save your money. If you must, gargle with warm salt water. It's a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

product_meta.title: Original Himalayan Crystal Salt Inhaler for Bronchial and Lung Health
feature_bullets: LUNG HEALTH: Reduces and thins mucus to decongest lungs, making it easier to breathe
HEALTHY ENVIRONMENT: Combat bacteria, funguses, viruses and mold that compromise respiratory health
HIGHEST QUALITY: Only Himalayan Salt with a certificate of analysis showing 84 Trace Minerals
PARTICLE SIZE: Our salt is so small it can penetrate the cell wall, hydrating vs dehydrating
NATURAL SALT CAVE: Our salt pipe combined with a neti pot is ideal for sinus & lung health
